workshop

Computer Vision with PyTorch

19 APR 2026

Time: 13:00 — 16:00

Location: Cotton Building CO246, Kelburn Campus

Build an image classifier from scratch using PyTorch. We'll cover CNNs, transfer learning, and model evaluation. Intermediate Python knowledge recommended.
